title: Blender Cauliflower Soup
subtitle: This healthy dish comes together in 15 minutes making it the perfect dinner recipe. Using the Vitamix the ingredients are blended together.
subtitle2: This soup has a delicious complex flavor balanced with the sweet taste of cauliflower. It is creamy from the almonds and cashews. The miso paste gives the soup a naturally cheesy flavor. This recipe comes together in minutes making it great to make right after work.

leeks.ingredient: leeks, white parts only, cleaned and cut

cauliflower.ingredient: steamed and cooled to room temp cauliflower florets

steps: Add water, olive oil, white miso paste, salt, leeks, garlic, cashews, almonds, cauliflower, black pepper, thyme, and dijon mustard to the ^blender$.
Start the machine, slowly increase to its highest speed, and blend for 6 minutes and 30 seconds.
If using the ^Vitamix$, select the hot soups program and allow the program to complete.
Divide soup among serving bowls and garnish with smoked paprika.
